solution_line_template: After going on vacation, Grandpa has {multiplier} * {initial_tomatoes} = <<{multiplier}*{initial_tomatoes}={total_tomatoes}>>{total_tomatoes} tomatoes.
So in his absence, {total_tomatoes} - {initial_tomatoes} = <<{total_tomatoes}-{initial_tomatoes}={tomatoes_grown}>>{tomatoes_grown} tomatoes have grown.
